title: Hybrid Simulation/VR-Based Advanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Course

context.prior_knowledge: Calculus and linear algebra fundamentals at the university level
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining mathematical modeling practice using VR devices with online discussion forums

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five or more complex mathematical problems in a 3D VR simulation environment.
Through hybrid interactions (content-instructor-peer), learners can apply 80% or more of mathematical concepts to real-world cases.
Using virtual collaboration tools, learners can design and present a mathematical problem-solving process three or more times with team members.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
